title: 2015 Countdown Problem #25: 'O Christmas Tree
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/830a6063be.2ec795ba01.AUF5oS.jpg?width=250"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"‘O Christmas Tree, ‘O Christmas Tree,","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
  
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Your branches green delight us!","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
  
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"They are green when summer days are bright,","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
  
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"They are green when winter snow is white.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
  
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"‘O Christmas Tree, ‘O Christmas Tree,","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
  
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Your branches green delight us!","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A gigantic Christmas tree at the atrium of a shopping mall initially had a total of 630 candy cane and snowflake ornaments. Unfortunately a few children playing near the tree damaged the tree, resulting in the mall management removing "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{2}{5}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of the candy cane ornaments as they are broken. As the mall management couldn’t find any replacement candy cane ornaments, they instead bought and decorated the tree with another 35 snowflake ornaments. After that, the number of snowflake ornaments the Christmas tree now had was "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{4}{13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" the total number of ornaments the tree now had. How many more candy cane ornaments than snowflake ornaments were there at first?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Photo Credits: http://www.christmas-graphics-plus.com/free/christmas-tree-clipart.html","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem is part of the set 2015 Countdown Problems.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

title: 2015 Countdown Problem #26: Trig-gy Trigonometry
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/830a6063be.fa6af6e97d.y56enM.jpg?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"
Consider the following two functions:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x)=1860\sin(\frac{2\pi x}{2015})"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"g(x)=775\cos(\frac{2\pi x}{2015})"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"When the graph "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y=f(x)+g(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is plotted against the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" axes, the resulting trigonometric graph has an amplitude of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\alpha"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", a period of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\beta"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and a y-intercept of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\gamma"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Also, the negative "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-intercept of the graph nearest to the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-axis can be expressed as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{\sigma}{\pi}  \tan^{-1}{\epsilon}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sigma"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Determine the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-\frac{\beta\sigma}{\alpha\gamma{\epsilon}^2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem is part of the set 2015 Countdown Problems.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f(x)+g(x) = 1860\sin(\frac{2\pi x}{2015})+775\cos(\frac{2\pi x}{2015}) "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"= \sqrt{{1860}^2+{775}^2}\sin(\frac{2\pi x}{2015} + \tan^{-1} {(\frac{775}{1860}))}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=2015\sin(\frac{2\pi x}{2015} + \tan^{-1} {(\frac{5}{12}))}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\alpha=2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\beta=2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" , "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\gamma=775"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To find the required "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-intercept we need to solve"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sin(\frac{2\pi x}{2015} + \tan^{-1} {(\frac{5}{12}))}=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By considering special angles you would arrive at"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=-\frac{2015 \tan^{-1}{(\frac{5}{12})}} {2\pi}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"u=\frac{1}{2} \tan^{-1} \frac{5}{12}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\tan^{-1} \frac{5}{12}=2u"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{5}{12}=\tan{2u}=\frac{2\tan u}{1-\tan^{2} u}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By considering the quadratic equation you would arrive at"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-intercept="},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(-\frac{2015}{\pi}) \tan^{-1}(\frac{1}{5}) \Rightarrow \sigma=-2015, \epsilon=\frac{1}{5}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-\frac{\beta \sigma}{\alpha \gamma {\epsilon}^2}=-\frac{-(2015)^2}{(2015)(775)(\frac{1}{5})^2}=65"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            I think you should prove atleast "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sigma"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\epsilon"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            We could also have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sigma=2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\epsilon=-\frac{1}{5}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", best to specify their respective signs in the question since you could also give "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-65"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as a valid answer as well.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: 2015 Countdown Problem #3: An A-maze-ing Maze
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/830a6063be.bcc4d4f038.LDbJxP.png?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"
An ant wishes to travel from point A to point B along the black lines in the maze shown below. The ant can only either travel upwards and rightwards, and cannot cross any of the grey zones in the maze. Calculate the number of ways the ant can travel between the two points."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clarification: The ant travels along the black lines and not along the white squares as a whole. After all, it starts and ends at two predetermined points A & B (which aren't squares).","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem is part of the set 2015 Countdown Problems.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There are 5 white-square ways"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"First way is 7 squares up and 17 right > (1x6x17 + 1 + 17) ways"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Second way is 5 squares right ,7 squares up and 13 right > (5x6x13 + 5 + 13) ways"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Third way is 9 squares right ,7 squares up and 9 right > (9x6x9 + 9 + 9) ways"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Fourth way is  squares right ,7 squares up and 13 right > (13x6x5 + 13 + 5) ways"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Fifth way is 17 squares right and 7 squares > (17x6x1 + 17 + 1) ways"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Adding all up gives 1560 ways"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            the first way you have 8 possible ways to turn right"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7 of them will lead you to 17 possible ways up and the last one has only one way to the end so it is (17x7 + 1)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the second way you have 6 possible ways up"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5 of them leads to 6 possible ways right which 5 of them will lead to 13 possible ways up to end while the last has one one way. and the last possible way up leads to 13 possible ways up to end so it is (5x6x13 + 5 + 13)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"and so on

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

 "First way is 7 squares up and 17 right > (1x6x17 + 1 + 17) ways"

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"mention","content":[{"type":"text","text":" @Mohamed Mohsen – "}],"attrs":[{"profile":""}]},{"type":"text","text":" Vertical crossing and horizontal crossing should be viewed in the same manner "}]},{"type":"text","text":" "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"mention","content":[{"type":"text","text":" @Julian Fuller – "}],"attrs":[{"profile":""}]},{"type":"text","text":" The question says "cannot cross grey zones" not touch "}]},{"type":"text","text":" "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            If I follow your logic then I have to say your count is off. There are only two ways. If the ant stays on black lines but cannot touch grey areas then all the ant can do is either immediately  7 lines up and then 17 lines to the right ( 1 path) or 17 lines to the right and then 7 lines up ( 2nd path). All the other paths you describe make you tough grey region.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            It is "travel along the black lines" not the white blocks

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            How is it that you can multiply it out like that? Because there are five paths the ant can take I got 5 for my answer.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clarification: The ant travels along the black lines and not along the white squares as a whole. After all, it starts and ends at two predetermined points A & B (which aren't squares)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A solution would be Mohammed Ahmend's solution where the number of ways to reach any point (excluding A) is the sum of the number of ways to reach the point immediately to the left of A as well as that directly below A. A recurrence table can be then set up as shown below:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"table","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"15"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"22"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"34"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"72"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"110"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"148"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"195"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"288"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"381"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"474"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"580"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"752"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"924"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1096"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1285"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1560"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"12"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"38"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"38"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"38"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"47"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"93"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"93"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"93"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"106"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"172"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"172"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"172"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"189"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"275"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"26"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"46"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"66"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"17"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"86"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"21"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"37"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"53"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"17"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"69"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"16"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"28"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"40"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"17"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"52"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"19"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"27"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"17"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"35"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"12"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"14"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"15"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"16"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"17"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"18"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"we can solve this problem with DP bottom up approach,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"cell(i,j) = cell(i-1,j) + cell(i,j-1)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"initially, cell(1,0) = cell(0,1) = 1"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"like this one: http://s5.postimg.org/d8httfhmf/image.jpg"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"sorry for calculation's mistake :P :D"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
